title: Knitted Handicraft Mrketplace - weaveworks
description: A full-stack marketplace for knitted and handmade craft items. Sellers can list their handicrafts; buyers can browse, purchase, and review. Built for learning and real use.

title: A Face Recognition Attendence System - Attendify
description: A system to automate attendance tracking using face recognition. Students (or users) are recognized via webcam / images; attendance is recorded without manual entry.

title: Social Media App - Nexu(WIP)
description: Nexu is a social media / networking application (or whatever your intended purpose) enabling users to create profiles, share content, follow each other, like & comment, etc.
